summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 4, University Gardens Addition, being the alley between 36th Avenue Northeast and 37th Avenue Northeast, from East 62nd Street to East 65th Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16985 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
